settings.comments: When enabled, this will add 'group1' to the 'IgnoredContent' config array, and remove it from there when disabled. Check config.ini to test the behaviour.
This will do the same for 'group2' to display how different values can coexist inside the array config.
This is to show how adding a duplicate value to a config array will behave (spoiler - both values are added and removed independently, since they come from different Settings).
